sears_products

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • sears_products.Product

  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the data for a single product result. Product data consists of: Title, Price and Vendor. Currently meant for use with Result.java and Assignment.java for text scraping sears.com
    Author:
    Andrew Neville
    June 20th 2013
    See Also:
    Result, Assignment
